<section begin=WeeklyBossDesc />'''Weekly Bosses''' are even more difficult than [[Normal Boss]]es and provide players with even greater rewards. After defeating each boss, a [[Trounce Blossom]] will spawn and players can choose to spend {{Item|Original Resin|30|x=30}} to claim the rewards from the first three weekly bosses of their choice, and then {{Item|Original Resin|30|x=60}} subsequently. The rewards can only be claimed once per week; alongside the reduced resin cost, they reset at 4 AM server time.

These fights become available at the end of the last act in an [[Archon Quest]] or a character's [[Story Quest]].

All weekly bosses drop their own specific [[Character Talent Material]]s, which are used to level [[talent]]s above Level 6. In addition to this, weekly bosses drop {{Item|Adventure EXP|30|x=300}}, a certain amount of {{Item|Mora|30}}, and {{Item|Companionship EXP|30}} depending on the player's [[World Level]]. There is also a chance they will drop certain [[Character Ascension Material]]s and [[Artifact]]s.

In addition, they can also drop billets ([[Northlander Billet|Northlander]]) ({{Item|Northlander Sword Billet|30|text=Sword}}, {{Item|Northlander Bow Billet|30|text=Bow}}, {{Item|Northlander Claymore Billet|30|text=Claymore}} {{Item|Northlander Catalyst Billet|30|text=Catalyst}}, {{Item|Northlander Polearm Billet|30|text=Polearm}}) or ([[Midlander Billet|Midlander]]) ({{Item|Midlander Sword Billet|30|text=Sword}} {{Item|Midlander Bow Billet|30|text=Bow}} {{Item|Midlander Claymore Billet|30|text=Claymore}} {{Item|Midlander Catalyst Billet|30|text=Catalyst}} {{Item|Midlander Polearm Billet|30|text=Polearm}}), depending on the boss fought. The billets have a better chance of dropping if fought in a higher domain level (or World Level for Andrius), although they're relatively uncommon.

Additionally, there is also a chance to drop {{Item|Dream Solvent|30|text=Dream Solvent}}, which is used to convert weekly boss talent materials into other types that the boss drops.<section end="WeeklyBossDesc" />
